If you have any questions or problems regarding the Mejor tool leave a question or your problem and wait for a response




How to download media or share

SnapChat,
There is a button in the blue color click on it and you can share or download

Instagram,
double tapping & Stories Long pressed

Facebook,
Long pressed stores & Videos There is an options button

Twitter,
Press the Share button

Whstapp, Whatsapp Business,
Press the Options button

TikTok,
A download button is available

Jodel,
An upload button is available from the album

Tumblr,
Long press
